sentences.english: As for my men, I have told them to meet me at a certain place.
sentences.chinese: 故此我已派定少年人在某處等候我。

sentences.english: And by reason hereof he ought, as for the people, so also for himself, to offer for sins.
sentences.chinese: 故此他理當爲百姓和自己獻祭贖罪。

sentences.english: Every positive definition is from memory and, therefore, inapplicable.
sentences.chinese: 任何正面的定義皆來自記憶，故此一無所用。

sentences.english: With a view to that, toler can be set to guarantee the success in stop loss.
sentences.chinese: 故此透過追加點數，以確保用家能成功止損。

sentences.english: Therefore, we re-design this survey, and ask you to fill in again.
sentences.chinese: 故此設計這個問卷調查，請再次填寫。

sentences.english: Therefore, the female should better avoid the monthly period to treat odontopathy again.
sentences.chinese: 故此，女性最好避開月經期再治療牙病。

sentences.english: Therefore pray for the remnant that still survives.
sentences.chinese: 故此，求你爲餘剩的民揚聲禱告。

sentences.english: He kept on bothering me with silly questions that I told him to go fly a kite.
sentences.chinese: 他盡用些傻里傻氣的問題來煩我，故此我叫他滾開。

sentences.english: Therefore, King Agrippa, I was not disobedient to the heavenly vision.
sentences.chinese: 亞基帕王啊，我故此沒有違背那從天上來的異象。

sentences.english: Don't trade your life for temporary things.
sentences.chinese: 故此，不要讓短暫的事佔滿你的生命。

sentences.english: I have made an appointment with the young men for such and such a place.
sentences.chinese: 故此我已派定少年人在某處等候我。

sentences.english: Wherefore the children of Israel shall keep the sabbath， to observe the sabbath throughout their generations， for a perpetual covenant.
sentences.chinese: 故此，以色列人要世世代代守安息日爲永遠的約。

sentences.english: Therefore, people always put the chicken as the top grade disease after repair.
sentences.chinese: 故此，人們一直把雞作爲病後進補的上品。

sentences.english: The teammates were so unreasonable that he left the football team.
sentences.chinese: 隊友太不講理了，故此他離開足球隊。

sentences.english: So David sings, "Where shall I go from your Spirit?"
sentences.chinese: 故此，大衛唱到，“”我往那裏去躲避你的靈？

sentences.english: Hence, errors may be regarded as deviations from veridicality.
sentences.chinese: 故此，誤差可被視爲偏離真實指標的情況。

definition: therefore/as a result/thus/and as a result, ...
that being the case/then/in that case
equivalent to either 是[shi4] or 就是[jiu4 shi4]
to such an extent as to/down to/up to
Youzhou, ancient province in north Hebei and Liaoning/Fanyang 範陽|范阳 ancient city near modern Beijing
